reporter_caption.center: WASFI v. BOARD OF VETERINARY, 207 Conn. 808 (1988)

caption.center: AMR A. WASFI v. BOARD OF VETERINARY REGISTRATION AND

opinion.opinion_text:
The plaintiffs petition for certification for appeal from the Appellate Court, 13 Conn. App. 817, is denied.
Noel R. Newman, in support of the petition.
Paul J. Lahey, assistant attorney general, in opposition.
